paragraphs.text: Our attitudes to accidental phone rings are stuck in the 80s
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even though the mobile has long since ceased to be a cutting-edge gadget possessed only by the high-earning early-adopting few
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is hopelessly out of step with what these machines now mean to us
